package.name: seneka_deployment_unit
package.description: The seneka_deployment_unit metapackage contains packages specifically for the deployment unit developed at Fraunhofer IPA in the SENEKA project. The deployment unit is used to deploy and retrieve the sensor nodes developed in the same project. Code for those can be found in the seneka_sensor_node repository.
package.author: Matthias Gruhler
Florian Mirus
